reviewText: Excellent!  Their work is wonderful, and the issues they stand for, are even more so.  It could stand a bit of restoration work, but that doesn't detract from the content.  You will need tissues in some parts! Would love to find more Dvds of their concerts and productions, but I can't seem to find anything.  I will keep trying!
Good documentary and history.  Good value for the price.
enjoyed since i USED TO BE A MEN;S CHORUS
